mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT I.INAME, T.TYPE, SUM(I.AMOUNT) AS CNT FROM (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_STATUS = 'N') I JOIN ITEM_TYPE T USING(TYPE_NO) GROUP BY I.INAME, T.TYPE ORDER BY INAME)
SELECT I.INAME, T.TYPE, SUM(I.AMOUNT) AS CNT FROM (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_STATUS = 'N') I JOIN ITEM_TYPE T USING(TYPE_NO) GROUP BY I.INAME, T.TYPE ORDER BY INAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM VALUES(SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL,#{iName},#{up},#{vat},#{vos},#{mfg},DEFAULT,DEFAULT,DEFAULT,DEFAULT,#{typeNo},#{cnCode},NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,#{unit}) SELECT SEQ_INO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT T.LCATEGORY,T.MCATEGORY,T.SCATEGORY,I.INO,I.INAME,I.UNIT,I.VOS,I.VAT,I.UP,I.MFG,C.CN_NAME,S.STRG_NAME,A.AREA_NAME,R.RM_NUM,I.RM_NO,T.TYPE,I.AMOUNT,C.CN_CODE,S.STRG_NO,A.AREA_NO FROM ITEM I JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) JOIN CONN C ON (C.CN_CODE = I.CN_CODE) LEFT JOIN ROOM R ON (I.RM_NO=R.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN STRG_AREA A ON (A.AREA_NO = I.AREA_NO) LEFT JOIN STRG S ON (A.STRG_NO = S.STRG_NO) WHERE I.INAME =#{iName} AND I.ITEM_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT RPT_NO,RPT_TITLE,RPT_STATUS FROM REP_REQ R JOIN REPORT USING(RPT_NO) ORDER BY RPT_NO ASC)
SELECT RPT_NO,RPT_TITLE,RPT_STATUS FROM REP_REQ R JOIN REPORT USING(RPT_NO) ORDER BY RPT_NO ASC

choose.when: SELECT LCATEGORY FROM ITEM_TYPE GROUP BY LCATEGORY
SELECT MCATEGORY FROM ITEM_TYPE WHERE LCATEGORY = #{lCategory} GROUP BY MCATEGORY

mapper.select: SELECT SCATEGORY,TYPE_NO FROM ITEM_TYPE ORDER BY SCATEGORY ASC
SELECT CN_NAME,CN_CODE FROM CONN JOIN ITEM USING(CN_CODE) JOIN ITEM_TYPE USING(TYPE_NO) WHERE TYPE_NO =#{typeNo} GROUP BY CN_NAME,CN_CODE ORDER BY CN_NAME ASC

choose.when: UPDATE ITEM SET AMOUNT=#{amount}, AREA_NO=#{areaNo}, SITE_CODE=#{strgName}, RM_NO=NULL WHERE INO = #{ino}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT T.TYPE,H.INO,MOD_DATE,MOD_COL,BEF_DATA,AFT_DATA,MOD_RSN,J8.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT,J1.AREA_NAME AS BEF_NAME, J2.AREA_NAME AS AFT_NAME,J3.STRG_NAME AS BEF_STRG_NAME,J4.STRG_NAME AS AFT_STRG_NAME,J5.RM_NUM AS BEF_RM_NUM,J6.RM_NUM AS AFT_RM_NUM,J7.INAME FROM ITEM_HIS H JOIN ITEM I ON (I.INO=H.INO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO=T.TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT AREA_NAME,TO_CHAR(AREA_NO) AS "AREA_NO" FROM STRG_AREA) J1 ON (H.BEF_DATA = J1.AREA_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT AREA_NAME,TO_CHAR(AREA_NO) AS "AREA_NO" FROM STRG_AREA) J2 ON (H.AFT_DATA = J2.AREA_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT STRG_NO,STRG_NAME FROM STRG) J3 ON (H.BEF_DATA = J3.STRG_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT STRG_NO,STRG_NAME FROM STRG) J4 ON (H.AFT_DATA = J4.STRG_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(RM_NO) AS "RM_NO" , RM_NUM AS RM_NUM FROM ROOM) J5 ON (H.BEF_DATA = J5.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(RM_NO) AS "RM_NO" , RM_NUM AS RM_NUM FROM ROOM) J6 ON (H.AFT_DATA = J6.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(INO) AS INO,INAME FROM ITEM) J7 ON(H.INO=J7.INO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(AMOUNT) AS "AMOUNT" FROM ITEM) J8 ON(H.AFT_DATA=J8.AMOUNT) ORDER BY MOD_DATE DESC)

SELECT T.TYPE,H.INO,MOD_DATE,MOD_COL,BEF_DATA,AFT_DATA,MOD_RSN,J8.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT,J1.AREA_NAME AS BEF_NAME, J2.AREA_NAME AS AFT_NAME,J3.STRG_NAME AS BEF_STRG_NAME,J4.STRG_NAME AS AFT_STRG_NAME,J5.RM_NUM AS BEF_RM_NUM,J6.RM_NUM AS AFT_RM_NUM,J7.INAME FROM ITEM_HIS H JOIN ITEM I ON (I.INO=H.INO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO=T.TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT AREA_NAME,TO_CHAR(AREA_NO) AS "AREA_NO" FROM STRG_AREA) J1 ON (H.BEF_DATA = J1.AREA_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT AREA_NAME,TO_CHAR(AREA_NO) AS "AREA_NO" FROM STRG_AREA) J2 ON (H.AFT_DATA = J2.AREA_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT STRG_NO,STRG_NAME FROM STRG) J3 ON (H.BEF_DATA = J3.STRG_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT STRG_NO,STRG_NAME FROM STRG) J4 ON (H.AFT_DATA = J4.STRG_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(RM_NO) AS "RM_NO" , RM_NUM AS RM_NUM FROM ROOM) J5 ON (H.BEF_DATA = J5.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(RM_NO) AS "RM_NO" , RM_NUM AS RM_NUM FROM ROOM) J6 ON (H.AFT_DATA = J6.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(INO) AS INO,INAME FROM ITEM) J7 ON(H.INO=J7.INO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(AMOUNT) AS "AMOUNT" FROM ITEM) J8 ON(H.AFT_DATA=J8.AMOUNT) ORDER BY MOD_DATE DESC
